Install BlackArch Repository

  1. Install BlackArch repository1):

    $ curl -Lo blackarch-install.sh https://blackarch.org/strap.sh
# sh ./blackarch-install.sh
# rm -f ./blackarch-install.sh
# pacman -Syyu

1)
Install BlackArch Linux repository: https://www.blackarch.org/downloads.html#install-repo.
